communityconfiguration: The title of Community Configuration entry point, only shown in Special:SpecialPages.
communityconfiguration-guidelines-title: Title of the first explanatory paragraph in the community configuration dashboard
communityconfiguration-guidelines-descri: Description in the first explanatory paragraph of the community configuration dashboard
communityconfiguration-guidelines-guidel: Title of the first guideline in the community configuration dashboard
Description of the first guideline in the community configuration dashboard
Title of the second guideline in the community configuration dashboard
Description of the second guideline in the community configuration dashboard
communityconfiguration-invalid-stored-co: Error message shown when the Community configuration editor is unable to load a valid configuration
communityconfiguration-providers-list-ti: Title of the list of providers in the community configuration dashboard
communityconfiguration-provider-not-foun:
Error for the configuration editor when a given provider is not found.

Parameters:
* $1 - The name of the provider
communityconfiguration-unknown-error: Generic error message for server errors in community configuration special page
communityconfigurationdashboard: The title of Community Configuration Dashboard special page
communityconfigurationeditor:
Title for the configuration editor of a given provider.

Parameters:
* $1 - The name of the provider
communityconfiguration-edit-summary-remi:
The message is displayed as a reminder in the edit summary dialog.

Parameters:
* $1 - gender
communityconfiguration-edit-summary-dial:
Title for the dialog where users can enter a summary of their edit and save changes.

Parameters:
* $1 - The provider name title
Placeholder text inside the edit summary input field, prompting users to describe the changes they made.
Label for the button in the edit summary dialog that saves the edit summary.
Label for the button in the edit summary dialog that cancels the action and closes the dialog.

Label for the edit summary input field used to show that providing an edit summary is not mandatory.

Prefix it with <kbd>&#32;</kbd> if words are separated by spaces in your language (which is true for most languages).
Label text for the edit summary dialog
